briefTitle: Enhancing Connections: Helping the Mother With Breast Cancer Support Her Child
officialTitle: Helping the Mother With Breast Cancer Support Her Child
primaryOutcomeMeasure: Increased parenting skills and confidence by diagnosed mothers
eligibilityCriteria:
Inclusion Criteria:

* Local or regional breast cancer recently diagnosed
* Able to read and write English
* Has one or more school age child(ren) living at home
* Married to a man or in a committed long-term intimate relationship with a male partner

Exclusion Criteria:

* Non-English speaking
* Advanced stage breast cancer
* Not recently diagnosed
* Single mother
